title: Sorry sorry sorry!
author: JGray
text:
This page should have been up yesterday. Technical difficulties. The start of the school season has everything in flux. Hopefully ya'll can forgive me.

Sorry again!

replies.author: J*Guest*
replies.text: I guess can I wonder what she is planning?

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: True enough Fair, but she really needs to invest in a silencer next time she gets a chance to visit earth.
